situation.title: Gardening
situation.meta_description: Gardening is not subject to any prohibitions and is therefore permitted.

content.processed:
Rules and recommendation

Gardening is not subject to any prohibitions and is therefore permitted. However, we recommend limiting contact with neighbours to the necessary minimum while maintaining the two-meters distance.

Helping your neighbours is possible, but risky - when working with neighbours we recommend wearing a face mask, avoiding physical contact and, if possible, keeping a two-meters distance.

questions_answers.question: Can I work in the garden?
Can I help my neighbour?
questions_answers.value: Yes, but wear a face mask, maintain two-meters distance and wash your hands after you return home.
